patthana16.32:1.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo nahetu dhammo uppajjati
patthana16.32:1.1_1: hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.
patthana16.32:2.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo nanahetu dhammo
patthana16.32:2.1_1: uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
